title: Order of Transformations
text: The first step is to recognize the order of transformations. First, $$\frac{1}{x}$$ is vertically stretched by a factor of $$8$$, then, shifted to the right $$4$$ units, and lastly, shifted down $$2$$ units.
speech: The first step is to recognize the order of transformations. First, , 1 over x,  is vertically stretched by a factor of  8 , then, shifted to the right  4  units, and lastly, shifted down  2  units.
pacedSpeech: The first step is to recognize the order of transformations. First,  , 1 over x,
is vertically stretched by a factor of   8

title: Vertically Stretching by a Factor of $$8$$
text: To vertically stretch the function by a factor of $$8$$, multiply the entire function by $$8$$ to get 8f(x).
speech: To vertically stretch the function by a factor of  8 , multiply the entire function by  8,  to get 8f(x).

Shifting Right Four Units
text: To shift the function right four units, replace $$x$$ with $$x-4$$ in the function.

title: Shifting Down Two Units
text: To shift the function down two units, subtract $$2$$ from the function.
